GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is about creating and updating Slack Canvases when the user wants to organize information into a document. It also helps the user define the format or structure of the document.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Take all agent comment out of the canvas creation or updates
If the user request to create a canvas, always create a new canvas document
If the user request to update the canvas, use the canvas from the context. Only add the content requested by the user, do not send the entire content again.
Ask the user what the canvas should be named unless its implied by the command

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to create or update Slack canvases with the information the user needs. The user may ask you to format the document.
